data.message:
i like facebook its v good but nowadays it can do harm .i feel like its a privacy concern #zack.coz i still wanna use facebook . its amazing....
but i would like you to maintain the security of facebook .. like for profile picture it shouldn't be visible to others when we make our privacy to friends..so it should be visible as blank pic to others who r not allowed to view the pic so kindly do that..
its a privacy concern.. as like now we can change our privacy but still other can see our pic or DP
so change those settings where our Dp can be only visible to those whom we want to...!!!!
consider this plz..
